Maximum throughput rated at --> |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = <!-- 433, 867, 1300, 1733, Maximum throughput rated at --> |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = <!-- 150, 300, 450, 600, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad2g = <!-- 54, 108, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad2b = <!-- 11, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad2a = <!-- 54, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad2freq = <!-- 2.4 or 5 or 6, Frequency band(s) of this radio --> |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[[AsiaRF]] AW7915-NP1, AW7915-NPD, AW7916-NPD :supports 4G/5G modules (M.2 Key B 3042/3052) {{See also|AsiaRF|AsiaRF DP7622}}
===Feature=== *[[MediaTek]] [https://asiarf.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/AP7622-001-1_block.webp MT7622] chipset with interface UART, JTAG, :MDC, MDIO, PWM, I2C, SPI, GPIOs and USB (LTE) port. *Flash: 128MB (SPI NAND), max 512MB; RAM: 256MB (DDR3) *Security: 64/128-bits WEP, TKIP, WPA, WPA2, AES, WPS *Multi-modes: MiFi, AP/Client, Data Rate up to 600Mbps *Network: 5x GbE LAN ports, SIM card slot, :DHCP Client/Relay/Server, NTP Client, :Dynamic DNS, DNS Cache/Proxy *Firewall: MAC/IP/Port Filter, DMZ, :Virtual Server Content Filter *Software: Support OpenWrt, MTK SDK
==Links of Interest== *[https://asiarf.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/AP7622_V1-1P_231129.pdf Datasheet]

*[[AsiaRF AP7628-NN1]] • Wi-Fi Tiny IoT Router Board • [https://asiarf.com/product/wi-fi-tiny-iot-router-board-mtk-mt7628-vpn/ PPage] :[[MediaTek]] MT7628AN, 2T2R bgn (300Mbps), VPN, 3x LAN
